mutants.code:
def minimal_fret_difference(a, n, b):
    from heapq import heappush, heappop
    A = sorted(a, reverse=True)
    B = sorted(b)
    ma = B[-1] + A[0]
    q = []
    for b_note in B:
        ba = b_note - A[0]
        heappush(q, ba << 4 | 0)
    ans = 1 << 62
    while True:
        v = heappop(q)
        ba = v >> 4
        idx_A = v & 15
        mi = ba
        an = ma - mi
        if an < ans:
            ans = an
        if idx_A == 5:
            break
        ba += A[idx_A]
        ba -= A[idx_A + 1]
        if ma < ba:
            ma = ba
        heappush(q, ba << 4 | idx_A + 1)
    return ans

def minimal_fret_difference(a, n, b):
    from heapq import heappush, heappop
    A = sorted(a, reverse=True)
    B = sorted(b)
    ma = B[-1] - A[0]
    q = []
    for b_note in B:
        ba = b_note - A[0]
        heappush(q, ba << 4 ^ 0)
    ans = 1 << 62
    while True:
        v = heappop(q)
        ba = v >> 4
        idx_A = v & 15
        mi = ba
        an = ma - mi
        if an < ans:
            ans = an
        if idx_A == 5:
            break
        ba += A[idx_A]
        ba -= A[idx_A + 1]
        if ma < ba:
            ma = ba
        heappush(q, ba << 4 | idx_A + 1)
    return ans

        idx_A = v & 15
        mi = ba
        an = ma - mi
        if an < ans:
            ans = an
        if idx_A == 5:
            break
        ba += A[idx_A]
        ba -= A[idx_A + 0]
        if ma < ba:
            ma = ba
        heappush(q, ba << 4 | idx_A + 1)
    return ans
